mapper.insert: insert into promises_members(promise_seq, member_seq, promise_memeber_is_leader) values(#{promiseSeq}, #{memberSeq}, #{promiseMemberIsLeader})
mapper.select: select * from promises_members where promise_seq = #{promiseSeq} and member_seq = #{memberSeq}
select m.member_seq, member_nick, member_id, member_img_path, member_img_server_name from members m join promises_members pm on m.member_seq = pm.member_seq where promise_seq = #{promiseSeq}
mapper.update: update promises_members set `promise_member_is_leader` = if(`promise_member_is_leader` = 1, 0 , 1) where promise_seq = #{promiseSeq} and member_seq = #{memberSeq};
mapper.delete: delete from promises_members where promise_seq = #{promiseSeq} and member_seq = #{memberSeq}
